div.p: No. 2338, pp. 798-800, unit 39, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to inform you that a communication has been received from the Honorable the Treasurer desiring that the monthly expenditure of all Departments may be limited, whenever this is possible, to the twelfth part of the sum appropriated for the year. You will be good enough to take note accordingly.
